attributes.background: The Financial Ombudsman Service do not follow UK law they make up their own rules and when they make mistakes which they do often but you have no appeal when they do make mistake they think they are omnipotent it time they were bought to boot and Overhauled and made to answer for their mistakes.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see to the Financial Ombudsman Service. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
